attributes.action: Lower the marriage visa age limit from 21 to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the spouse visa age limit was raised to 21 to stop forced marriages.i am a british citizen and over 21 and married to a american citizen under 21 and we are not allowed to live together in the uk until she becomes 21 i think this law is inhumane and is causing heart break for us please sighn this  petition to change this law and allow genuine couples who are married and in love to live together and not be torn apart by law
